member.name: T:System.IObservable`1
member.summary: Provides an observable object mechanism to support push-style iteration over an observable sequence for publish/ subscribe event processing.

member.name: T:System.IObserver`1
member.summary: Provides a mechanism to support push-style iteration over an observable sequence for publish/ subscribe event processing.

member.name: M:System.IObserver`1.OnCompleted
member.summary: Notifies the observer of the end of the observable sequence. No further values or notifications will be made available for this sequence.

member.name: M:System.IObserver`1.OnError(System.Exception)
member.summary: Notifies the observer that an exception has occurred in processing the observable sequence.

member.name: M:System.IObserver`1.OnNext(`0)
member.summary: Notifies the observer of a new value in the observable sequence.
